name: Aquagelâ„¢ 55
description: AQUAGEL 55 is a rheology modifier, stabilizer, thickener and emulsifier. It swells fast and allows you to create gel or cream immediately without neutralization or heat. It can emulsify all kinds of oil and disperse pigment and physical sunscreen. This product will maintain viscosity under UV radiation while resisting shearing for a long amount of time. It is recommended to be applied in cream, lotion, creamy gel, make-up foundation, sunscreen cream, formulas containing polar solvent, alcohol, polyol and formulas containing silicone or AHA.
